Distances¶

Functions to perform distance transformations

distances.calc_distance(params, cov_matrix)¶

Calculate Distances

Parameters

  • params (array) – length 3 vector.

  • cov_matrix (array) – 3x3 matrix.

Returns

distance and standard deviation

distances.method_simple(params, cov_matrix)¶

Simple Method

For parallaxes that have large errors or negative Runs 100 Monte Carlo simulations and calculates the mean and SD of the calculated distances

Parameters

  • params (array) – length 3 vector.

  • cov_matrix (array) – 3x3 matrix.

Returns

distance and standard deviation
